entry.title: 54" x 72" Royal Blue 10 Mil Thick Waterproof Tablecloth PVC Rectangle Disposable Tablecloth
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_2250
Type: Tablecloths
Price: 1.58 - 17.68 (2 variants)

[About]

Quantity: 1 Tablecloth
Material: Plastic
Color: Royal Blue
Product Length: 72 inches
Product Width: 54 inches
Product Thickness: 10 mil
Design : Solid
Shape: Rectangle
Reusable: Yes
Seamless: yes
Durable: Yes
Waterproof: Yes
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

    [Information]

    Eliminate the hassle of cleaning the table cloths and keeping them wrinkle free. These accident resistant heavy duty plastic table cloths are sturdy enough to avoid tears and rips, and an ideal choice for outdoor/ indoor parties, birthday bashes, banquets and other culinary events. We offer these durable, disposable and upscale quality plastic Waterproof Tablecloth to solve the budgetary challenges usually faced by professional party planners, family reunion organizers, and themed birthday party planners.

    Multi-Use

    These table covers are an ideal choice for any occasions. Speed up cleaning so you can turn tables faster! You'll never have to waste time and money laundering linen table covers again.

    Decorative

    Aside from its elegance, it effectively repels water, making it ideal for protecting tables from spills. You'll never have to worry about juice or wine spilling across the table again.

    Durable

    Our Waterproof Tablecloth is made from high quality PVC plastic which gives you superior strength and durability and also provides the convenience of disposability that your events require.

    Additional Information:

    • Uses : Wedding, Birthday, Party, Event, Banquet, Restaurant Decoration
    • Note : For table cover only, no other decorations are included.

entry.title: 72" x 72" White Vivacious Daisy Embroidered Organza Square Overlay
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_2220
Type: Overlays
Price: 10.28 - 117.38 (2 variants)

[About]

  • Material: Embroidered Daisy Pattern with Iridescent Sequins sewn on
  • Size: 72"x72" square
  • Edges are hemmed.
  • Works beautifully with our tablecloths
  • All sizes are approximate measurements.
  • Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

Let the magic of dreamy daisies together with the bedazzling shimmer and glimmer of shiny sequins create an ethereal feel of a paradise orchard at your wedding or party ambiance. This glamorous fabric is fashioned brilliantly using sheer, delicate organza fabric having a see-through quality, accentuated with the shiny sequin circles and mesmeric daisy flowers embroidered all over the fabric with an iridescent thread. This daisy inspired fabric oozes the oodles of glitz and glam into your banquet or reception tables. The angelic hue of sheer organza together with florals and sequins imparts an ethereal feel of a snowy ground filled with beautiful budding daisies all around, topped with twinkling sequin accents.

Additional Information:

  • Material: Embroidered Daisy Pattern with Iridescent Sequins sewn on
  • Size: 72"x72" square
  • Edges are hemmed.
  • Works beautifully with our tablecloths
  • For table overlay only, table covers and other decorations are sold separately.
  • Uses: Wedding, Party, Event, Banquet, Decoration

Linen Care Instructions

entry.title: 90"x132" Silver Rectangular Tablecloth, Linen Table Cloth With Slubby Textured, Wrinkle Resistant
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_2252
Type: Tablecloths
Price: 20.59 - 234.99 (2 variants)

Color: Silver

These High Quality tablecloths are made from fine polyester yarn with beautiful, textured weaves.

Gives floor length hang on 30"X72" tables
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

    [Information] 

    Faux Burlap

    Flaunting the rustic elegance of real jute and eye-catching sheen of smooth linen, our innovative Faux Burlap Tablecloth line will dress your party and banquet tables to the nines. Crafted from 100% pure polyester with a look that emulates pure burlap, these soft, smooth, yet highly sturdy tablecloths are an ideal choice for both indoor and outdoor events, weddings, picnics, birthdays, corporate events, rustic or country theme weddings, and south Western style events.

    Seamless Finish & Serged Edges

    With seamless finish and serged edges, these tablecloths will instantly add a ravishing rustic charm to your otherwise plain tabletops. With the enticing bucolic look and texture of real jute, our faux burlap linens can withstand extensive re-use and heavy duty events without losing their fresh look and luster.

    Faux Jute Linen

    Blending sturdiness and softness together in a beautiful manner, these faux jute linens are completely odorless unlike their natural counterparts. Choose from the stunning range of classy colors and chic shapes, the one that matches perfectly with your theme and set most sophisticated tablescapes ever. For a completely coherent look and effect, pair these faux jute linens with our burlap table skirts, table overlays, chair covers and sashes, napkins and jute accented centerpieces.


    Additional Information:

    • Quantity: 1 Tablecloth
    • Fabric: Faux Linen
    • Color: Silver
    • Size: 90" X 132"
    • GSM: 160
    • Serge Length: 0.5"
    • Features: Slubby Texture, Wrinkle Resistant, Anti-Shrink, Soft and supple
    • Fabric Care: Machine wash with cold water with mild detergent. For best results air dry. Cannot put in Dryer. Air Dry ONLY

entry.title: 12"x108" Coral Satin Table Runner
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_2230
Type: Runners
Price: 0.98 - 273.42 (2 variants)

[About]

Quantity: 1 Table Runner
Material: Satin
Color: Coral
Size: 12" W x 108" L
Seamless, 1 pc design. Edges are serged.
Works beautifully with our tablecloths.
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.


[Information]

Silky Smooth Satin Table Runners

Silky, smooth, and shiny satin always inspires people; there is an overwhelming charm and sophistication that this imperial fabric exudes. This attribute makes it a number one choice for decoration, embellishing and ornamenting. Our supreme quality Satin Table Runners are fashioned with sublime refinement and extra smoothness to create one of a kind table decor accents for those special events that call for an extra dash of swanky urbanity and a red carpet treatment.

Royal Look & Effect

Spread these shimmering sheets atop your drab tables and plain table linens to create a perfect celebratory mood that will leave your guests in a complete awe of such a festal decoration. Oozing royal feel and luster, our Satin Table Runners are ideal to give your plain tables and tablecloths a quick glamorous twist. Elevate the elegance of your tables manifold at wedding, birthday, holiday dinner, Christmas feast, and special events  by draping with these lush spreads.

     

Premium Quality

Dress your tables to the nines with our durable, reusable and totally adorable Satin Table Runners that will give your guests an instant esteemed feel and royal treatment during your event. Fashioned from premium quality silky satin, these Runners can be used again and again to spruce your tables up without losing their regal luster and seamless sheen.

Additional Information:

  • How to Care: Machine washable with Cold water
  • For table runner only, table covers and other decorations are sold separately.
  • Uses: Wedding, Party, Event, Banquet, Restaurant Decoration

Linen Care Instructions

entry.title: 90"x132" Ivory Rectangular Tablecloth, Linen Table Cloth With Slubby Textured, Wrinkle Resistant
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_2252
Type: Tablecloths
Price: 20.59 - 234.99 (2 variants)

[About]
Quantity: 1 Tablecloth
Fabric: Faux Linen
Color: Ivory
Size: 90" X 132"
1 piece, seamless design
Serged edges for an exquisite look
GSM: 160
These High Quality tablecloths are made from fine polyester yarn with beautiful, textured weaves.
Features: Slubby Texture, Wrinkle Resistant, Anti-Shrink, Soft and supple
Gives floor length hang on 30"X72" tables
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

    [Information] 

    Faux Burlap

    Flaunting the rustic elegance of real jute and eye-catching sheen of smooth linen, our innovative Faux Burlap Tablecloth line will dress your party and banquet tables to the nines. Crafted from 100% pure polyester with a look that emulates pure burlap, these soft, smooth, yet highly sturdy tablecloths are an ideal choice for both indoor and outdoor events, weddings, picnics, birthdays, corporate events, rustic or country theme weddings, and south Western style events.

    Seamless Finish & Serged Edges

    With seamless finish and serged edges, these tablecloths will instantly add a ravishing rustic charm to your otherwise plain tabletops. With the enticing bucolic look and texture of real jute, our faux burlap linens can withstand extensive re-use and heavy duty events without losing their fresh look and luster.

    Faux Jute Linen

    Blending sturdiness and softness together in a beautiful manner, these faux jute linens are completely odorless unlike their natural counterparts. Choose from the stunning range of classy colors and chic shapes, the one that matches perfectly with your theme and set most sophisticated tablescapes ever. For a completely coherent look and effect, pair these faux jute linens with our burlap table skirts, table overlays, chair covers and sashes, napkins and jute accented centerpieces.


    Additional Information:

    • Quantity: 1 Tablecloth
    • Fabric: Faux Linen
    • Color: Ivory
    • Size: 90" X 132"
    • GSM: 160
    • Serge Length: 0.5"
    • Features: Slubby Texture, Wrinkle Resistant, Anti-Shrink, Soft and supple
    • Fabric Care: Machine wash with cold water with mild detergent. For best results air dry. Cannot put in Dryer. Air Dry ONLY
